name: VaultConfigurationModule
description: Rari Vault Configuration Module. Module for configuring Vault parameters.

eventDecorators.name: CustomFeePercentUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Vault has its custom fee percentage set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault that had its custom fee percentage set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newCustomFeePercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom fee percentage for the Vault.

eventDecorators.name: CustomHarvestDelayUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Vault has its custom harvest delay set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault that had its custom harvest delay set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newCustomHarvestDelay
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom harvest delay for the Vault.

eventDecorators.name: CustomHarvestWindowUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Vault has its custom harvest window set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault that had its custom harvest window set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newCustomHarvestWindow
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom harvest window for the Vault.

eventDecorators.name: CustomTargetFloatPercentUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Vault has its custom target float percentage set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault that had its custom target float percentage set/updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newCustomTargetFloatPercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom target float percentage for the Vault.

eventDecorators.name: DefaultFeePercentUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the default fee percentage is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultFeePercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new default fee percentage.

eventDecorators.name: DefaultHarvestDelayUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the default harvest delay is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultHarvestDelay
parameterDecorators.description: The new default harvest delay.

eventDecorators.name: DefaultHarvestWindowUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the default harvest window is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultHarvestWindow
parameterDecorators.description: The new default harvest window.

eventDecorators.name: DefaultTargetFloatPercentUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the default target float percentage is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultTargetFloatPercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new default target float percentage.

functionDecorators.name: defaultFeePercent
functionDecorators.description: The default fee percentage for Vaults.

functionDecorators.name: defaultHarvestDelay
functionDecorators.description: The default harvest delay for Vaults.

functionDecorators.name: defaultHarvestWindow
functionDecorators.description: The default harvest window for Vaults.

functionDecorators.name: defaultTargetFloatPercent
functionDecorators.description: The default target float percentage for Vaults.

functionDecorators.name: getVaultCustomFeePercent
functionDecorators.description: Maps Vaults to their custom fee percentage.

functionDecorators.name: getVaultCustomHarvestDelay
functionDecorators.description: Maps Vaults to their custom harvest delay.

functionDecorators.name: getVaultCustomHarvestWindow
functionDecorators.description: Maps Vaults to their custom harvest window.

functionDecorators.name: getVaultCustomTargetFloatPercent
functionDecorators.description: Maps Vaults to their custom target float percentage.

functionDecorators.name: setDefaultFeePercent
functionDecorators.description: Sets the default fee percentage for Vaults.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultFeePercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new default fee percentage to set.

functionDecorators.name: setDefaultHarvestDelay
functionDecorators.description: Sets the default harvest delay for Vaults.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultHarvestDelay
parameterDecorators.description: The new default harvest delay to set.

functionDecorators.name: setDefaultHarvestWindow
functionDecorators.description: Sets the default harvest window for Vaults.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultHarvestWindow
parameterDecorators.description: The new default harvest window to set.

functionDecorators.name: setDefaultTargetFloatPercent
functionDecorators.description: Sets the default target float percentage for Vaults.

parameterDecorators.name: newDefaultTargetFloatPercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new default target float percentage to set.

functionDecorators.name: setVaultCustomFeePercent
functionDecorators.description: Sets the custom fee percentage for the Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to set the custom fee percentage for.

parameterDecorators.name: customFeePercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom fee percentage to set.

functionDecorators.name: setVaultCustomHarvestDelay
functionDecorators.description: Sets the custom harvest delay for the Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to set the custom harvest delay for.

parameterDecorators.name: customHarvestDelay
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom harvest delay to set.

functionDecorators.name: setVaultCustomHarvestWindow
functionDecorators.description: Sets the custom harvest window for the Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to set the custom harvest window for.

parameterDecorators.name: customHarvestWindow
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom harvest window to set.

functionDecorators.name: setVaultCustomTargetFloatPercent
functionDecorators.description: Sets the custom target float percentage for the Vault.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to set the custom target float percentage for.

parameterDecorators.name: customTargetFloatPercent
parameterDecorators.description: The new custom target float percentage to set.

functionDecorators.name: syncFeePercent
functionDecorators.description: Syncs a Vault's fee percentage with either the Vault's custom fee percentage or the default fee percentage if a custom percentage is not set.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to sync the fee percentage for.

functionDecorators.name: syncHarvestDelay
functionDecorators.description: Syncs a Vault's harvest delay with either the Vault's custom harvest delay or the default harvest delay if a custom delay is not set.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to sync the harvest delay for.

functionDecorators.name: syncHarvestWindow
functionDecorators.description: Syncs a Vault's harvest window with either the Vault's custom harvest window or the default harvest window if a custom window is not set.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to sync the harvest window for.

functionDecorators.name: syncTargetFloatPercent
functionDecorators.description: Syncs a Vault's target float percentage with either the Vault's custom target float percentage or the default target float percentage if a custom percentage is not set.

parameterDecorators.name: vault
parameterDecorators.description: The Vault to sync the target float percentage for.
